sentences.en: A stampede broke out when the doors opened.
a stampede to buy shares in high-tech companies
sentences.cn: 对高科技公司股票的抢购

sentences.en: Companies will now stampede to release their latest software.
sentences.cn: 很多公司现在都蜂拥推出他们最新的软件产品.

sentences.en: Given even a trivial shock, this realization may into a stampede.
sentences.cn: 即使给一点小的冲击, 这种意识也可能导致蜂拥出逃.

sentences.en: Several children were pushed over in the stampede.
sentences.cn: 有几个小孩在惊慌逃奔中绊倒了.

sentences.en: Several deer were killed in the stampede.
The cattleman was caught in a stampede of dollars.
sentences.cn: 金钱劈头盖脑地落到牧牛人身上.

sentences.en: The elephants might be scared to see a mouse and a stampede.
sentences.cn: 大象们可能会看到老鼠而害怕地惊慌逃跑.

sentences.en: The pickup comes as investors have slowed their stampede into bond funds.
sentences.cn: 这一现象发生在投资者放慢购买债券基金之际.

sentences.en: The president declined to stampede them.
sentences.cn: 总统倾向于把他们吓跑.

sentences.en: There was a stampede for the exit.
sentences.cn: 大家都争先恐后地朝出口涌去。

sentences.en: There was a stampede of boots up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 楼梯上也有一阵皮靴声.

sentences.en: There was a stampede of panic - stricken crowd from the burning hotel.
sentences.cn: 一群惊惶失措的人们,从失火的旅馆中跑了出来.

sentences.en: There was a stampede towards the stage when the singer appeared.
sentences.cn: 歌手出现时观众向台前涌去.

sentences.en: When he shouted & quot ; fire & quot ; there was a stampede to the exits.
sentences.cn: 他一大喊“ 起火 ”, 人群就向出口蜂拥而去.

sentences.en: When the general stampede occurred Winterborne had also been looking on.
sentences.cn: 当那场全面大混乱发生的时候,维特波恩还一直在旁观着.

trans.tran_cn: 惊逃，人群的蜂拥，军队溃败
trans.tran_en: If there is a stampede, a group of people or animals run in a wild, uncontrolled way.
if a group of large animals or people stampede, they suddenly start running together in the same direction because they are frightened or excited

trans.tran_cn: 使（动物）惊逃，使（人群）涌向
